home.alert-beta-text: If you have been selected to participate in the beta version of this application, enter your email address here:
home.alert-betaerror-text: Incorrect mail or already used! If you had a beta pass, you manifest in the dedicated channel so that we solve your problem ^^
home.alert-first-text: You have earned the right to become a player. Do you want to accept?
home.alert-exit-text: Do you want to leave the application?

identity.alert-pseudolimit-text: You can only change your nickname once a month, so choose wisely!
identity.alert-pseudowait-text: You must wait {} days before you can change it again.
identity.alert-incorrectemail-text: Please enter a valid email address.
identity.alert-sendemail-text: A verification email has been sent to you!
identity.alert-blacklist-text: This device has been blacklisted, please use another email address to connect.
identity.alert-wrongpseudo-text: This nickname is already in use, please choose another one.

calendar.alert-remove-text: Are you sure you want to eliminate this activity?
calendar.alert-wrongtiming-text: The selected activity how or ends during another.

skills.text-empty: Add an activity, the associated skills will appear here

settings.alert-clear-text: Reset all data in the app (except the beta pass)?
settings.alert-disconnect-text: Do you want to log out? Data will only be saved locally

descriptions.sag: Wisdom is a special skill, it allows you to gain bonus experience depending on your level. It is acquired by doing personal development activities such as meditation or other.
descriptions.int: Intelligence is a very broad statistic, as soon as you use your brain, you train your brain and therefore gain intelligence points. The main skills to gain intelligence are school work and thinking work.
descriptions.con: Confidence is a special statistic, each hour of skill (no matter what skill you do) gives you 1 point of confidence, so it increases with you and tells you how many hours of activity you have done.
descriptions.for: Strength is a fairly simple statistic, it increases by doing skills that require it, like bodybuilding, sports or physical jobs for example!
descriptions.end: Stamina is probably the activity that you will improve the fastest! This is a key statistic that improves in almost all sports!
descriptions.agi: Agility is probably the longest statistic to build, it is not often required and improves slowly, the best ways to increase your agility are actis like stretching or yoga.
descriptions.dex: Dexterity is the agility of the fingers, so it improves a lot on precision tasks, writing tasks on a computer or even with musical instruments.

leaderboard.alert-onlineneed-text: A connection is required to access the ranking!
leaderboard.alert-connectneed-text: To appear in the ranking, log in by entering your email address in the 'Identity' page.

about.alert-unavailable-text: The site will be available soon, a little patience ^^
